# init()

**Initializer**

Creates a coordinate span that represents a width and height on a map.

## Declaration

```swift
init()
```

## Creating a coordinate span

- **init(latitudeDelta:longitudeDelta:)**: Creates a new [doc://com.apple.mapkit/documentation/MapKit/MKCoordinateSpan] from the specified values.
